name: Caching Proxy Linux Deployments
description: I will have my Raspberry Pi cache all my updates for Windows machines with the use of Squad over a single LAN interface and Linux updates by means of apt-cach

description: A small node.js script which posts a linux server's load and uptime to your twitter timeline.

name: Hamster
